2.) It was agreed that the data of this survey should derive
from 3 major sources:
a. Grass-roots opinions and projections of local
college and school administrators;
b. Regional conferences with small, typical groups
of administrators now using the medium;
c. Experienced and informed projection by staff
consultants of survey.
The comprehensive written surveys and personal interviews at
the grass-roots level will provide a body of collateral evi¬
dence for the final results. They will also provide a basis
for comparing projections of opinion with experience.
